Summary: It was about as big as a house, triangle shaped with three briliant lights at each point.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Casa Grande
There were no other sightings in Casa Grande on or around June 30th 1991
divs: Sighting DetailsSubject was about ten years old at the time. He was standing in the back yard playing with his dog. He noticed something moving out of the corner of his eye. He had no idea of what it was. It moved very slowly. He watched it for a while, then looked down at his dog, looked back up and the object had disappeared. Object was stayed the entire time in the Northeast direction.
